turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi honey, I need you to order me some Dominos for my sister's birthday party this evening.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds like fun! Did you want pickup or delivery for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup, since I'll be going by there on my way home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool, pickup it is. What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one pizza. I'm thinking the three cheese pizza will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't seem to have a three cheese pizza, did you mean the Wisconsin 6 Cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay then, anything special about it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want to add bacon, ham, and mushrooms to that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Crunchy thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! Anything else for your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order has been placed!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What did the price come to?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total was $22.33, and it should be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They'll also be sending your receipt via text to your phone shortly. Can I do anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all I need. Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're so welcome! Have a good party!
